spirit:hwParameter.spirit:prompt: Use scrubber to detect data errors
Allow scrubber to repair detected errors
Provide RAM read address with the data
Use pipeline register for read data
Enable Micro RAM B read port
Use pipeline register for read address

spirit:vendorExtensions.actel-cc:script: Enable('RAM_PIPE', Eq('MODE', 'Create internal RAM block with full EDAC support'));\ Enable('DLY_RD_A_ON', Eq('MODE', 'Create internal RAM block with full EDAC support'));\ Enable('SCRUB_ON', Eq('MODE', 'Create internal RAM block with full EDAC support'));\ Enable('WRBK_ON', Eq('SCRUB_ON', '1'));\ Enable('DIV_WDTH', Eq('SCRUB_ON', '1'));\ Enable('TMOUT_SET', Eq('SCRUB_ON', '1'));\ Enable('SCRUB_AMIN', Eq('SCRUB_ON', '1'));\ Enable('SCRUB_AMAX', Eq('SCRUB_ON', '1'));\ Enable('SIM_RAM', Eq('MODE', 'Create internal RAM block with full EDAC support'));\ Enable('INIT_RAM', Eq('MODE', 'Create internal RAM block with full EDAC support'));\ Enable('URAM', And(Eq('MODE', 'Create internal RAM block with full EDAC support'), Eq('FAMILY', 'SmartFusion2')));\ Enable('URAM_A_PIPE', And(Eq('MODE', 'Create internal RAM block with full EDAC support'), Eq('FAMILY', 'SmartFusion2')));\ Enable('URAM_PORT_B', And(Eq('MODE', 'Create internal RAM block with full EDAC support'), Eq('FAMILY', 'SmartFusion2')));\ Enable('RAM_DEPTH', Eq('MODE', 'Create internal RAM block with full EDAC support'));\ Enable('TMR', And(Neq('FAMILY', '25'), Neq('FAMILY', '12')));\

spirit:enumeration.spirit:text: Use external RAM block (only create codec)
Create internal RAM block with full EDAC support

spirit:vendorExtensions.actel-cc:description: Actel optimized Error Detection And Correction logic protects data stored in a RAM block. It detects double bit errors and corrects any single bit soft (transient) errors in RAM words from 4 to 64 bits wide. The core utilizes a specific shortened Hamming code as well, as optional pipelining to achieve high performance. The EDAC logic optionally implements RAM scrubbing, a procedure that prevents the RAM of accumulating the soft errors.
